Title: Series: Idee Pittoresche sopra la Fugga in Egitto
Description: Plate 24: the Virgin and Child at the left with an angel, while Joseph drives the donkey over the brow of the hill. 1750/2 Etching
Exhibition history: 2005 Sep-Oct, Worcester City AG (Sth Bank Tour), In All Directions 2005 Oct-Dec, Plymouth City MAG (Sth Bank Tour), In All Directions 2006 Feb-Mar, Carlisle, Tullie House (Sth Bank Tour), In All Directions 2006 Apr-May, Aberystwyth Arts Centre (Sth Bank Tour), In All Directions
